item.title: Python: Click - Handling Date Parameter
item.description: I’ve been building a little CLI application using the Python Click Library, and I wanted to pass in a Date as a parameter. There’s more than one way to do this. Let’s first install the Click library: pip install click And now we’ll import our required libraries: from datetime import date import click Now we’ll create a sub command that takes two parameters: date-start and date-end.
